QuestData.Title: Clearing the Mist
QuestData.Description: <The troll's skin looks pale. Beads of sweat dot his brow.>$B$BI know you owe me nouting, but if you be willin' ta help me, I have a favor to ask.$B$BTa da north, dere be da creature dat is da cause a' dis poisonous mist.$B$BOnly da heart a' dis beast has da power ta neutralize da toxins in my body.$B$BYa may have ta kill some a dose crawlers while you're at it.$B$BIf ya feel weak from da poison, eat some a dose glowing mushrooms ta counter da effects.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Cerulean Crawlers and collect the Overgrown Heart.
